verses.verse: It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when all the kings who were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the hill <S%H2022>country,<s%> and in the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> and on all the <S%H2348>shore<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H4136>front<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> heard of <S%H8085>it<s%>
that they <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and with <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6310>accord.<s%>
But when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> what <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and to <S%H5857>Ai,<s%>

they also <S%H6213>resorted<s%> to a <S%H6195>ruse,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> and made as if they had been <S%H6737>ambassadors,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1087>old<s%> <S%H8242>sacks<s%> on their <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and <S%H4997>wineskins,<s%> <S%H3196><s%> <S%H1087>old<s%> and <S%H1234>torn<s%> and bound <S%H6887>up,<s%>

and <S%H1087>old<s%> and <S%H2921>patched<s%> <S%H5275>shoes<s%> on their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and wore <S%H1087>old<s%> <S%H8008>garments.<s%> All the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of their <S%H6718>provision<s%> was <S%H3001>dry<s%> and <S%H5350>moldy.<s%>

They <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> and to the men of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "We have <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%> Now therefore <S%H3772>make<s%> a covenant with <S%H1285>us.<s%>"

The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> <S%H194>"What<s%> if you <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H3772>us.<s%> How could we make a covenant with <S%H1285>you?<s%>"
They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "We are your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>" <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H370>them,<s%> "Who are you? Where do you come <S%H935>from?<s%>"

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5650>him,<s%> "Your servants have <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> because of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> for we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of his <S%H8089>fame,<s%> all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

and all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> who were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and to <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> who was at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth.<s%>

Our <S%H2205>elders<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of our <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>us,<s%> saying, <S%H3947><s%> 'Take <S%H6720>provision<s%> in <S%H3027>your<s%> hand for the <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> and tell <S%H5650>them,<s%> "We are your servants. Now <S%H3772>make<s%> a covenant with <S%H1285>us.<s%>"'

This our <S%H3899>bread<s%> we took <S%H2525>hot<s%> for our <S%H6679>provision<s%> out of our <S%H1004>houses<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> we went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H3001>you;<s%> but now, behold, it is dry, and has become <S%H5350>moldy.<s%>

These <S%H4997>wineskins,<s%> <S%H3196><s%> which we <S%H4390>filled,<s%> were <S%H2319>new;<s%> and <S%H1234>behold,<s%> they are torn. These our <S%H8008>garments<s%> and our <S%H5275>shoes<s%> have become <S%H1086>old<s%> because of the <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7230>long<s%> <S%H1870>journey.<s%>"
The <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3947>sampled<s%> their <S%H6718>provisions,<s%> and <S%H7592>didn't<s%> ask counsel from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with <S%H6213>them,<s%> and made a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H2421>them,<s%> to let them live. The <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> swore to <S%H7650>them.<s%>

It happened at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H8085>them,<s%> that they heard that they were their <S%H7138>neighbors,<s%> and that they <S%H3427>lived<s%> among <S%H7130>them.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to their <S%H5892>cities<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> Now their <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> <S%H3716>Chephirah,<s%> <S%H881>Beeroth,<s%> and Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>didn't<s%> strike <S%H5387>them,<s%> because the princes of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to them by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> All the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against the <S%H5387>princes.<s%>

But all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> "We have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to them by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> now therefore we <S%H3201>may<s%> not touch <S%H5060>them.<s%>
This we will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H2421>them,<s%> and let them live; lest <S%H7110>wrath<s%> be on <S%H7621>us,<s%> because of the oath which we swore to <S%H7650>them.<s%>"

The <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2421>them,<s%> "Let them live, so they became <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H2404>cutters<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for all the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> as the <S%H5387>princes<s%> had spoken to <S%H1696>them.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H1696>them,<s%> and he spoke to <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "Why have you <S%H7411>deceived<s%> <S%H559>us,<s%> saying, <S%H3966><s%> 'We are very <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H3427>you,<s%>' when you live among <S%H7130>us?<s%>

Now therefore you are <S%H779>cursed,<s%> and some of you will never <S%H3772>fail<s%> to be <S%H5650>bondservants,<s%> both <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H2404>cutters<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God.<s%>"

They <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because your <S%H5650>servants<s%> were <S%H5046>certainly<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> how <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you all the <S%H776>land,<s%> and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3966>you.<s%> Therefore we were very <S%H3372>afraid<s%> for our <S%H5315>lives<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H6213>you,<s%> and have done this <S%H1697>thing.<s%>
<S%H2009>Now,<s%> behold, we are in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> <S%H6213>Do<s%> to us as it <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> to you to <S%H6213>do.<s%>"
He <S%H6213>did<s%> so to <S%H5337>them,<s%> and delivered them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> so that they <S%H2026>didn't<s%> kill them.

That <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H2404>cutters<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he should <S%H977>choose.<s%>
